name: tweetsense
description: Stream live Twitter data into Mapsense.

MAPSENSE_API_KEY.description: A Mapsense API key with the 'api' scope. Visit developer.mapsense.co to sign up!

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: Your Twitter API access token key.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your Twitter API access token secret.

TWEETSENSE_UNIVERSE.description: The name of the Mapsense universe that Tweetsense should stream tweets into.

TWEETSENSE_TRACK.description: One or more comma-separated Twitter keywords on which to filter incoming tweets.
